document.full_text: citigroup inc  shut down a $400 million hedge fund that used the bank's money and mathematical models to bet on stocks, in the wake of new regulations aimed at stopping proprietary trading, bloomberg reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
document.title: citi shuts down $400 million proprietary hedge fund: report
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  shut down a $400 million hedge fund that used the bank's money and mathematical models to bet on stocks, in the wake of new regulations aimed at stopping proprietary trading, bloomberg reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
